Clean To-do List

To get started, click the '+' button in projects, add some list items, and see where they go.

You begin with three default projects: All, Today, and This Week. These projects are automatically populated with the to-dos you place in your own projects.

Checked items will automatically drop to the bottom of each list.

You can edit list items at any time by clicking on the text of the item.

Sort by priority or due date.
